# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## Unreleased
- Initial public documentation with Sphinx + Furo
- Added README and GPL-3.0-or-later LICENSE
- Added SPDX headers to source files
- Offline support instructions and tooling
- Deployment docs for Deno Deploy, Docker, reverse proxy, and systemd
- UI improvements: responsive globe, theme persistence, palette resizer, fit-to-window
